techmeme.title: Mistral releases its first multimodal model, Pixtral 12B, available on GitHub and Hugging Face, and via API "soon" (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Riot Platforms plans the world's largest bitcoin mine in Corsicana, a former Texas oil boom town, using a liquid immersion system, despite residents' protests (Joel Khalili/Wired)
A surge in scams poses a serious image problem for Revolut, which faces more complaints than its large UK rivals about authorized push payment scams (Aisha S Gani/Bloomberg)
An analysis finds 40+ examples of Facebook removing emergency-related posts during 20+ US wildfires since June 2024; Facebook says it is investigating the issue (Brianna Sacks/Washington Post)
The former CEO of Everyday Robotics, Alphabet's AI robotics moonshot that was shut down in January 2023, reflects on its start and efforts to give AI a body (Hans Peter Brondmo/Wired)
